Achievements.Name: Sabotage
Achievements.Description: Locate the enemy fuel depot and destroy all of their fuel.

Achievements.Name: Peacenik
Achievements.Description: Finish a level without killing any enemies. Only friendly fire deaths are allowed.

Achievements.Name: Speedrun
Achievements.Description: Finish any level in less than 20 seconds.

Achievements.Name: Rampage
Achievements.Description: Kill 20 or more enemies on any level.

Achievements.Name: Stealth Bomber
Achievements.Description: Complete a level without setting off any alarms.

Achievements.Name: Step Back From The Brink
Achievements.Description: Beat the game, save the world.

Achievements.Name: Weapons Specialist: Hand Gun
Achievements.Description: Defeat 25 enemies with the hand gun.

Achievements.Name: Weapons Specialist: Silencer
Achievements.Description: Defeat 25 enemies with the silencer pistol.

Achievements.Name: Weapons Specialist: Grenade Launcher
Achievements.Description: Defeat 25 enemies with the grenade launcher.

Achievements.Name: Weapons Specialist: Assault Rifle
Achievements.Description: Defeat 25 enemies with the assault rifle.
